full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'PHAGS PA 'OD ZER DRI MA MED PA LHA DRUG GI BDAG MDUN BUM GSUM GYI CHO GA DBANG BSKUR TSUL GYI THO TZAM DANG BCAS PA PHAN BDE'I MCHOG SBYIN DANG, DE DANG 'BREL BA'I 'CHI BLU'I LAG LEN 'CHI MED DPAL 'BYUNG ZHABS SU MTHUD PA BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @023A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA 'OD ZER DRI MA MED PA LHA DRUG GI BDAG MDUN BUM GSUM GYI CHO GA DBANG BSKUR TSUL GYI THO TZAM DANG BCAS PA PHAN BDE'I MCHOG SBYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGON DU LHAR BCAS 'GRO BA'I GTZUG RGYAN BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS MED RJE BTZUN DAM PA CHEN PO DE NYID NAS, SKYA SER GYI SKYE BO DU MAS BSOD NAMS GSOG PA'I THABS MKHAS SU ZHAL 'DEBS BSDUS TE, RNAM RGYAL MCHOD RTEN GSER ZANGS LAS GRUB PA BRGYANGS KHRU BDUN GYI MTHO TSAD CAN BZHENGS SU BCUG PAR MDZAD NAS, NGED LA 'DI'I NANG GZHUG SOGS DNGOS GTZANG BAR KHYOD KYIS BGYID DGOS ZHES ZHAL CHEMS STZAL BA DANG, DE MTSUNGS KHU RE CHEN MO'I 'PHRIN LAS PA RNAMS NAS KYANG KHO BO CAG LA, ,GSAR BZHENGS MCHOD RTEN GYI LAS BYED RNAMS LA DRI MED RNAM GNYIS KYI DBANG BSKUR NAS, MCHOD RTEN GYI NANG DU DE GNYIS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR GZHUG PA DANG, SROG SHING 'DZUGS PA'I CHO GA BGYID DGOS TSUL GYI GSUNG NAN CHEN BYUNG BA BZHIN BSGRUB PAR PHYOGS PA'I TSE, 'JUG PA BDE BA'I YIG CHA 'DI LTA BU DGOS PAR MTHONG NAS, BRGYUD LDAN @023B BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI DRUNG NAS DRI MED RNAM GNYIS KYI DBANG DANG RIG GTAD, ,BKLAG LUNG RNAMS NOS SHING, KUN MKHYEN BU STON BRGYUD 'DZIN DANG BCAS PA'I YIG CHA DANG, ,ZIN BRIS TSAD LDAN LA BRTEN NAS, RGYAL KHAMS PA ^ DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, CHOS TSUL 'DI NYID MI NUB DAR ZHING RGYAS PA'I ZHABS 'DEGS SU 'GYUR BA SOGS BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
